name: CircularFifoQueue_addTest
description: Unit tests for the add functionality of the CircularFifoQueue class.

test_cases.name: testAddElementSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful addition of an element to the CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenFull
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to the CircularFifoQueue when it is full.

test_cases.name: testAddNullElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of a null element to the CircularFifoQueue, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAndCheckFullCapacity
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of elements to the CircularFifoQueue and checks if it reaches full capacity.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAndCheckSize
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of elements to the CircularFifoQueue and checks the size after each addition.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAndRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of elements to the CircularFifoQueue and checks the removal of elements.

test_cases.name: testAddElementAndClear
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of elements to the CircularFifoQueue and checks the clearing of the queue.
